alert.note: Alert for Box Elder; Davis; Morgan; Salt Lake; Summit; Weber (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:11PM MDT until July 17 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Weber County in northern Utah... Southeastern Box Elder County in northern Utah... Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Davis County in northern Utah... Southwestern Morgan County in northern Utah... Southwestern Summit County in northern Utah... * Until 645 PM MDT * At 611 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles north of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway to near Camp Williams, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Blowing dust may reduce visibility to a mile or less. * Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Ogden, Layton, Murray, Bountiful, Farmington, Brigham City, Park City, Morgan, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Draper, Riverton, Roy, Cottonwood Heights and Clearfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 287 and 361. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 100. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 102 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Elder; Davis; Morgan; Salt Lake; Summit; Weber
